TOBSPA sponsors Payatas scouts

02 December 2014

TOBSPA members contributed to fund the BSP registration fees and neckerchiefs of Scouts from Lupang Pangako Elementary School in Payatas, Quezon City.

Read More

TOBSPA welcomes, inducts 2012 TOBS Awardees

01 December 2014

TOBSPA officially welcomed the 2012 awardees of the nationwide Search for the Ten Outstanding Boy Scouts of the Philippines as the newest members of the Association during its General Assembly on October 1, 2012 at the Boy Scouts of the Philippines National Executive Board Room.

Read More

TOBSPA welcomes, inducts 2012 TOBS Awardees

01 December 2013

TOBSPA officially welcomed the 2012 awardees of the nationwide Search for the Ten Outstanding Boy Scouts of the Philippines as the newest members of the Association during its General Assembly on October 1, 2012 at the Boy Scouts of the Philippines National Executive Board Room.

TOBSPA welcomes, inducts 2012 TOBS Awardees

01 December 2012

TOBSPA officially welcomed the 2012 awardees of the nationwide Search for the Ten Outstanding Boy Scouts of the Philippines as the newest members of the Association during its General Assembly on October 1, 2012 at the Boy Scouts of the Philippines National Executive Board Room.
